task_name: Process Daily Report Files for Entity Extraction and Consolidation
context: to extract entities, validate data, and consolidate daily activity reports from all employees
description: Automated daily processing of markdown report files from employees across all departments. Uses AI-powered entity extraction to identify Tasks, Tools, Responsibilities, Projects, and Milestones. Validates data quality, consolidates reports into department and executive summaries, and updates master tracking systems. Critical operational task supporting the Daily Reports v2.1 system and entity taxonomy maintenance.
estimated_duration: 1.5 hours (30 min automation run + 45 min validation + 15 min reporting)
dependencies: Daily report files available in employee folders
Claude API access for entity extraction
Google Sheets API access for data consolidation
tools_required: TOL-003 (Gemini 3 Pro) for validation and QA
File system access to Dropbox/ENTITIES folders
success_criteria: All employee daily reports processed (30+ files)
Zero parsing errors or data corruption
Department summaries generated for all 8+ departments
Master tracking sheets updated (Activities, Tasks, Tools)
Entity IDs assigned following naming conventions
Data quality validation passed (no duplicates, proper formatting)

steps.name: Collect daily report files from employee folders
outputs: List of all daily.md files from date folder (e.g., '20' for Nov 20)

steps.name: Run entity extraction pipeline
outputs: Raw entity data extracted (Tasks, Tools, Responsibilities, Projects)
Confidence scores assigned to each entity
Source references linked to employee reports

steps.name: Validate extracted entities
outputs: Entity IDs validated against existing taxonomy

steps.name: Generate department summaries
outputs: 8+ department report files (AID, DGN, DEV, HRM, LGN, SLS, SMM, VID)
Department-level metrics (task count, tool usage, time allocation)

steps.name: Archive processed reports and publish summaries

checklist.item: All employee reports collected (no missing files)
Department summaries generated for all active departments
Data quality validation passed (zero critical errors)
Backup created before overwriting existing data

roi_metrics.time_savings: Saves 6-8 hours of manual report consolidation daily
roi_metrics.data_quality: 95%+ accuracy in entity extraction vs 80% with manual entry
roi_metrics.strategic_value: Enables real-time visibility into organizational activities and resource allocation
